org.middleheaven.core.bootstrap
Class AbstractBootstrap

java.lang.Object
  org.middleheaven.core.bootstrap.AbstractBootstrap
Direct Known Subclasses:
TestBootstrap
public abstract class AbstractBootstrap
extends Object

Implements the generic inicilaization engine for the MiddleHeaven platform. Subclasses of AbstractBootstrap implement bootstrap in different execution environments and enable for the application's execution to be environment independent. Every bootstrap defines implementations for a set of pre-defined services. The provided services are:

  • LoggingService - Provides the generic mecanics to deliver logging messages
